items.sentence: Are you suggesting that I don't do that today?
Mary had never mentioned her boyfriend before.
Tom keeps trying to get Mary to hold his hand.
How come Tom gets to be promoted, and I don't?
Tom chased me with a baseball bat in his hand.
My job involves helping people solve problems.
I'm glad that the two of you are in agreement.
I'm very glad that you feel the same way I do.
I wish that I could give you more information.
I wish that I'd never asked you that question.
I wish that my wife wouldn't complain so much.
I wish that this kind of thing never happened.
I wish that we could've gone a little further.
That isn't the main reason Tom had to do that.
I just thought that was the right thing to do.
I'm afraid that Tom won't get a second chance.
How much time is Tom going to spend in Boston?
I pay 30 euros for every visit to the dentist.
I lost my sense of direction in the snowstorm.
I was asked to show my passport at the border.
